member.summary: Indicators based on financial analysis.

member.summary: Returns the constructed instance but only when every necessary property set (otherwise null).

member.summary: Indicators calculated from the fundamental numbers and market data.

member.name: P:Peter.Models.Interfaces.IFinancialAnalysis.PE
member.summary: Price/Earning ratio (latest closing price divided by the earning per share).

member.summary: Returns all the ISINs in the collection.

member.name: T:Peter.Models.Interfaces.IMarketDataEntity
member.summary: Data downloaded from the data vendor page.

member.name: P:Peter.Models.Interfaces.IMarketDataEntity.ClosingPrice
member.summary: Latest recorded price (in euro). If recorded after closing it is called closing price.

member.name: P:Peter.Models.Interfaces.IMarketDataEntity.Isin
member.summary: ISIN of the stock (ISIN = International Securities Identification Number).

member.name: P:Peter.Models.Interfaces.IMarketDataEntity.Name
member.summary: Name of the stock.

member.name: P:Peter.Models.Interfaces.IMarketDataEntity.PreviousDayClosingPrice
member.summary: Recorded closing price (in euro) on the previous day.

member.name: P:Peter.Models.Interfaces.IMarketDataEntity.StockExchange
member.summary: The name of the stock exchange from where the data were downloaded.

member.name: P:Peter.Models.Interfaces.IMarketDataEntity.Volumen
member.summary: Number of stocks traded during the day.

member.summary: Company name.

member.name: P:Peter.Models.Interfaces.xxxINameToIsin.Isin
